atm.controller

Class TransferAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • atm.controller.TransferAgent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Agent, java.lang.Runnable

    public class TransferAgent
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable, Agent
    TransferAgent class to perform transfers from one BankAccount to another BankAccount.
    Author:
    Chris Carson
